Articles.Content: Kerbals have been used for ~~experimentation~~ space exploration for many years now, but never had we had the opportunity to really experiment with their biology. The Kerbal Life Sciences mod changes that now by allowing you to perform real life physical experiments on your Kerbonauts. The mod provides two experiments: the Advanced Diagnostic Ultrasound in Microgravity and the Sonographic Astronaut Vertebral Examination. Check out the video below and the [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112340](**forum thread** to find out more!

Glad to see this mod featured, it integrates nicely into what I am pleased to call "stock\*".

\*may contain MechJeb, TAC-LS, USI, and/or other mods.
Lol, does it eat up the Kerbal?
It would be nice to see different kinds of science integrated into the stock experience.
Jeb, Bob, Bill!? ,,, You've just been promoted ,,, to lab rats.

> 
> Sonographic Astronaut Vertebral Examination

This always makes me think about Dala softly oOOoOOOoooohing at me in the think tank.

This, along with all Nehemiah's science mods, really add to the science bits of the game.
Well deserved recognition, Nehemia's set of science mods are great and really add to the stock game.
ggcarmelo do you think you could put up a link to your csv rosters file with MJ and Kareem and Real Madrid? That would be awesome
